document.docAuthor: Jennings, John T. & Austin, Andrew D.
document.masterDocTitle: Synopsis of the hymenopteran fauna of Lord Howe Island with a preliminary checklist of species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Synopsis of the hymenopteran fauna of Lord Howe Island with a preliminary checklist of species

heading.emphasis: Checklist of Hymenoptera of Lord Howe Island

caption.paragraph:
TABLE 1. Hymenoptera recorded from Lord Howe Island. * = endemic; AFD = Australian Faunal Directory (2014); AM = Australian Museum. Note: In a few cases, there may be duplications (e.g.,
Ceraphron
sp. identified by Dodd (1924) which may be the same as one of the unidentified species) resulting in a small over-estimate of species richness totals.
